title: Herzog and Žižek become uncanny AI bots trapped in endless conversation
description: New site provides all the finest points of nonsense philosophy, verbalized forever.

title: HBO cancels Westworld before what was to be its final season
description: HBO canceled the series due to high production costs and declining viewership.

title: Bivalent booster is 4x better against BA.5 in older adults, Pfizer says
description: But the shots are only effective if people actually get them.

title: Linux devs discover that Intel Arc GPU firmware updates need an Intel CPU
description: Firmware updates are rare, but if ever a GPU was going to need one, it's Arc.

title: Musk floats several gimmicks to make Twitter profitable
description: Pivot to paid features starts with Twitter Blue, reportedly launching next week.

title: Cherry’s new mechanical switch hails from ’80s terminal keyboards
description: Nicknamed Nixies, they're like MX Blacks, but stiffer and, purportedly, smoother.

title: Swedish engineer creates playable accordion from 2 Commodore 64 computers
description: Linus Åkesson's instrument sports custom software and a bellows made of floppy disks.

title: Netflix’s ad-supported plan doesn’t work on Apple TV, “older” Chromecasts, PS3
description: Some brand-new and months-old devices don't currently work with ads.

title: Musk to gut Twitter infrastructure, cut costs by $1B annually
description: Reducing servers and cloud services risks outages during peak traffic times.

title: Bungie to PS5 owners: Stop playing the old PS4 version of Destiny 2 already
description: A "notable" number of players haven't downloaded the free upgrade, Bungie says.

title: Twitter shuts offices for day as it cuts 50% of workforce; staff already suing
description: Twitter staff plans to fight layoffs in a San Francisco court.

title: Virgin Galactic delays development of ship capable of higher flight rate
description: "The economic momentum of the company is around the Delta ships."

title: Corpus Christi sold its water to Exxon and is losing its big bet on desalination
description: Concerns over ecological destruction have delayed desalination plans for years.

title: Rocket Report: SLS boosters may expire in December; Blue Origin delivers the BE-4s
description: "We’re eager to get the helicopter back out there and advance our rocket reusability."
